text: London Recordings (or London Records) is a British record label. It sold records for Decca Records from 1947 to 1980. It sold these records in places such as the United States, Canada, and Latin America. After 1980, London started to work in a more independent (working alone) way. The label is owned by Because Music. == Owned labels == London Records has owned many other record labels. Some of these are: == References == Category:British record labels
title: London Recordings
